Notably, this event marked the first time a UFC event was headlined by two fighters from the United Kingdom.

Title: UFC 229: Khabib vs. McGregor
Description: UFC 229: Khabib vs. McGregor was a mixed martial arts event held on October 6, 2018, at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada. The main event featured a highly anticipated lightweight championship bout between Khabib Nurmagomedov and Conor McGregor. This event gained significant attention due to the intense rivalry between the fighters, resulting in a post-fight brawl. It remains one of the most talked-about events in UFC history.

Title: UFC 23: Ultimate Japan 2
Description: UFC 23: Ultimate Japan 2 was held on November 19, 1999, at the Tokyo Bay NK Hall in Tokyo, Japan. This event featured a highly anticipated heavyweight championship bout between Randy Couture and Maurice Smith, with Couture emerging victorious. Additionally, notable fights included Kazushi Sakuraba defeating Marcus Silveira and Tito Ortiz defeating Wanderlei Silva. The event showcased the growing popularity of mixed martial arts in Japan.

Title: UFC 230: Cormier vs. Lewis
Description: UFC 230: Cormier vs. Lewis was a mixed martial arts event held on November 3, 2018, at Madison Square Garden in New York City. The main event featured a heavyweight championship bout between Daniel Cormier and Derrick Lewis. Notably, Cormier defended his title successfully, submitting Lewis in the second round. This event marked the UFC's return to Madison Square Garden for the third consecutive year.

Title: UFC 231: Holloway vs. Ortega
Description: UFC 231: Holloway vs. Ortega was a mixed martial arts event held on December 8, 2018, at the Scotiabank Arena in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. The main event featured a thrilling featherweight title bout between champion Max Holloway and challenger Brian Ortega. The co-main event showcased a women's flyweight title fight between Valentina Shevchenko and Joanna Jędrzejczyk. This event marked the fourth time the UFC had visited Toronto.

Title: UFC 232: Jones vs. Gustafsson 2
Description: UFC 232: Jones vs. Gustafsson 2 was a mixed martial arts event held on December 29, 2018, at The Forum in Inglewood, California. The main event featured a highly anticipated rematch between Jon Jones and Alexander Gustafsson for the vacant UFC Light Heavyweight Championship. Notably, this event was moved from Las Vegas to California on short notice due to an abnormality found in Jones' drug test.

Title: UFC 233: Cejudo vs. Dillashaw
Description: UFC 233: Cejudo vs. Dillashaw was a mixed martial arts event held on January 26, 2019, at the Honda Center in Anaheim, California. The main event featured a flyweight championship bout between Henry Cejudo and TJ Dillashaw. Unfortunately, the event was ultimately canceled due to unforeseen circumstances, making it a unique occurrence in UFC history.

Title: UFC 234: Adesanya vs. Silva
Description: UFC 234: Adesanya vs. Silva was a mixed martial arts event held on February 9, 2019, at the Rod Laver Arena in Melbourne, Australia. The main event featured a thrilling showdown between rising star Israel Adesanya and former middleweight champion Anderson Silva. This highly anticipated fight showcased the clash of generations, as Adesanya emerged victorious in a memorable encounter. The event also included other exciting matchups, making it a memorable night for MMA fans.

Title: UFC 235: Jones vs. Smith
Description: UFC 235: Jones vs. Smith was a mixed martial arts event held on March 2, 2019, at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada. The main event featured a light heavyweight championship bout between Jon Jones and Anthony Smith. Notable fights included a welterweight title fight between Tyron Woodley and Kamaru Usman, and a thrilling showdown between Ben Askren and Robbie Lawler. This event showcased top-tier talent and delivered an unforgettable night of action.

Title: UFC 236: Holloway vs. Poirier 2
Description: UFC 236: Holloway vs. Poirier 2 was a mixed martial arts event held on April 13, 2019, at the State Farm Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. The main event featured a rematch between Max Holloway and Dustin Poirier for the interim UFC Lightweight Championship. The co-main event showcased an interim UFC Middleweight Championship bout between Kelvin Gastelum and Israel Adesanya. This event marked the second meeting between Holloway and Poirier, with Poirier emerging victorious via unanimous decision.

Title: UFC 237: Namajunas vs. Andrade
Description: UFC 237: Namajunas vs. Andrade was a mixed martial arts event held on May 11, 2019, at the Jeunesse Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. The main event featured a thrilling battle between Rose Namajunas and Jessica Andrade for the UFC Women's Strawweight Championship. Andrade emerged victorious with a stunning slam knockout, claiming the title. The event also showcased other exciting fights, making it a memorable night for MMA fans.

Title: UFC 238: Cejudo vs. Moraes
Description: UFC 238: Cejudo vs. Moraes was a mixed martial arts event held on June 8, 2019, at the United Center in Chicago, Illinois. The main event featured a bantamweight title fight between Henry Cejudo and Marlon Moraes. Valentina Shevchenko defended her flyweight title against Jessica Eye in the co-main event. This event showcased thrilling matchups and marked Cejudo's successful bid for a second UFC championship belt.

Title: UFC 239: Jones vs. Santos
Description: UFC 239: Jones vs. Santos was a mixed martial arts event held on July 6, 2019, at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada. The main event featured a light heavyweight championship bout between Jon Jones and Thiago Santos. The co-main event showcased a women's bantamweight title fight between Amanda Nunes and Holly Holm. This event also marked the return of Ben Askren, who faced Jorge Masvidal in a highly anticipated welterweight clash.

Title: UFC 24: First Defense
Description: UFC 24: First Defense was a mixed martial arts event held on March 10, 2000, at the Lake Charles Civic Center in Lake Charles, Louisiana. The main event featured Kevin Randleman defending his UFC Heavyweight Championship against Pedro Rizzo. This event marked Randleman's first title defense and showcased the rising popularity of the UFC in the early 2000s.

Title: UFC 240: Holloway vs. Edgar
Description: UFC 240: Holloway vs. Edgar was a mixed martial arts event held on July 27, 2019, at Rogers Place in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. The main event featured a featherweight championship bout between Max Holloway and Frankie Edgar. Notably, Holloway successfully defended his title against Edgar, showcasing his exceptional striking skills. The event also included exciting matchups such as Cris Cyborg vs. Felicia Spencer and Geoff Neal vs. Niko Price.

Title: UFC 241: Cormier vs. Miocic 2
Description: UFC 241: Cormier vs. Miocic 2 was a mixed martial arts event held on August 17, 2019, at the Honda Center in Anaheim, California. The main event featured a highly anticipated rematch between Daniel Cormier and Stipe Miocic for the UFC Heavyweight Championship. The event also showcased thrilling fights such as Nate Diaz vs. Anthony Pettis and Yoel Romero vs. Paulo Costa, making it a memorable night for fight fans.

Title: UFC 242: Khabib vs. Poirier
Description: UFC 242: Khabib vs. Poirier was a mixed martial arts event held on September 7, 2019, at The Arena, Yas Island in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. The main event featured a lightweight championship bout between Khabib Nurmagomedov and Dustin Poirier. Nurmagomedov successfully defended his title, submitting Poirier in the third round. This event marked the first time a UFC pay-per-view was held in Abu Dhabi since UFC 112 in 2010.

Title: UFC 243: Whittaker vs. Adesanya
Description: UFC 243: Whittaker vs. Adesanya was a mixed martial arts event held on October 6, 2019, at Marvel Stadium in Melbourne, Australia. The main event featured a highly anticipated middleweight title unification bout between Robert Whittaker and Israel Adesanya. Adesanya emerged victorious, becoming the undisputed UFC Middleweight Champion. With over 57,000 attendees, it set a record for the largest attendance in UFC history.

Title: UFC 244: Masvidal vs. Diaz
Description: UFC 244: Masvidal vs. Diaz was a mixed martial arts event held on November 2, 2019, at Madison Square Garden in New York City. The main event featured a highly anticipated welterweight bout between Jorge Masvidal and Nate Diaz for the BMF (Baddest Motherf****r) title. This event marked the UFC's 500th live event and showcased a stacked card with exciting matchups, making it a memorable night for fight fans.

Title: UFC 245: Usman vs. Covington
Description: UFC 245: Usman vs. Covington was a mixed martial arts event held on December 14, 2019, at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada. The main event featured a welterweight championship bout between Kamaru Usman and Colby Covington. Other notable fights included Max Holloway defending his featherweight title against Alexander Volkanovski and Amanda Nunes defending her bantamweight title against Germaine de Randamie. The event drew significant attention due to the intense rivalry between Usman and Covington.

Title: UFC 246: McGregor vs. Cowboy
Description: UFC 246: McGregor vs. Cowboy was a mixed martial arts event held on January 18, 2020, at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada. The main event featured former two-division champion Conor McGregor facing Donald "Cowboy" Cerrone in a welterweight bout. McGregor won the fight in just 40 seconds, marking his return to the octagon after a 15-month hiatus. The event also showcased other exciting matchups, making it a highly anticipated night for UFC fans.

Title: UFC 247: Jones vs. Reyes
Description: UFC 247: Jones vs. Reyes was a mixed martial arts event held on February 8, 2020, at the Toyota Center in Houston, Texas. The main event featured a light heavyweight championship bout between Jon Jones and Dominick Reyes. The co-main event showcased a women's flyweight title fight between Valentina Shevchenko and Katlyn Chookagian. This event marked Jones' third successful title defense and Shevchenko's third consecutive defense of her belt.

Title: UFC 248: Adesanya vs. Romero
Description: UFC 248: Adesanya vs. Romero was a mixed martial arts event held on March 7, 2020, at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada, United States. The main event featured a middleweight championship bout between Israel Adesanya and Yoel Romero. This highly anticipated fight showcased Adesanya's striking skills against Romero's explosive power. The event also included a co-main event between Zhang Weili and Joanna Jędrzejczyk for the women's strawweight championship.

Title: UFC 249: Ferguson vs. Gaethje
Description: UFC 249: Ferguson vs. Gaethje was a mixed martial arts event held on May 9, 2020, at the VyStar Veterans Memorial Arena in Jacksonville, Florida. The main event featured a highly anticipated interim lightweight championship bout between Tony Ferguson and Justin Gaethje. This event marked the return of UFC after a temporary hiatus due to the COVID-19 pandemic, making it a significant moment in the sport's history.

Title: UFC 25: Ultimate Japan 3
Description: UFC 25: Ultimate Japan 3 was a mixed martial arts event held on April 14, 2000, at the Yoyogi National Gymnasium in Tokyo, Japan. The event featured a highly anticipated rematch between Tito Ortiz and Wanderlei Silva for the UFC Light Heavyweight Championship. It also showcased notable fighters such as Kazushi Sakuraba, Guy Mezger, and Pedro Rizzo. This event marked the third time the UFC held an event in Japan.

Title: UFC 250: Nunes vs. Spencer
Description: UFC 250: Nunes vs. Spencer was a mixed martial arts event held on June 6, 2020, at the UFC Apex facility in Las Vegas, Nevada. The main event featured a women's featherweight championship bout between Amanda Nunes and Felicia Spencer. Nunes successfully defended her title, dominating Spencer throughout the fight. This event marked Nunes' first defense of her featherweight belt and her fifth defense of the bantamweight title.

Title: UFC 251: Usman vs. Masvidal
Description: UFC 251: Usman vs. Masvidal was a mixed martial arts event held on July 11, 2020, at the Flash Forum on Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. The main event featured a welterweight championship bout between Kamaru Usman and Jorge Masvidal. This event marked the first of the UFC's "Fight Island" series, held in a secure bubble due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Title: UFC 252: Miocic vs. Cormier 3
Description: UFC 252: Miocic vs. Cormier 3 was a mixed martial arts event held on August 15, 2020, at the UFC Apex facility in Las Vegas, Nevada. The main event featured a highly anticipated trilogy fight between Stipe Miocic and Daniel Cormier for the UFC Heavyweight Championship. This event marked the final fight of Cormier's career. The card also showcased other exciting matchups, making it a memorable night for MMA fans.

Title: UFC 253: Adesanya vs. Costa
Description: UFC 253: Adesanya vs. Costa was a mixed martial arts event held on September 26, 2020, at the Flash Forum on Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. The main event featured a highly anticipated middleweight championship bout between Israel Adesanya and Paulo Costa. Adesanya successfully defended his title, delivering a dominant performance. This event marked the first time two undefeated fighters competed for the middleweight belt in UFC history.

Title: UFC 254: Khabib vs. Gaethje
Description: UFC 254: Khabib vs. Gaethje was a mixed martial arts event held on October 24, 2020, at the Flash Forum on Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. The main event featured a highly anticipated lightweight championship bout between Khabib Nurmagomedov and Justin Gaethje. This event marked Khabib's final fight before retiring undefeated, solidifying his legacy as one of the greatest fighters in UFC history.

Title: UFC 255: Figueiredo vs. Perez
Description: UFC 255: Figueiredo vs. Perez was a mixed martial arts event held on November 21, 2020, at the UFC Apex facility in Las Vegas, Nevada. The main event featured a flyweight championship bout between Deiveson Figueiredo and Alex Perez. This event marked Figueiredo's first title defense after winning the vacant belt earlier in the year. The co-main event showcased a women's flyweight title fight between Valentina Shevchenko and Jennifer Maia.

Title: UFC 256: Figueiredo vs. Moreno
Description: UFC 256: Figueiredo vs. Moreno was a mixed martial arts event held on December 12, 2020, at the UFC Apex facility in Las Vegas, Nevada. The main event featured a flyweight championship bout between Deiveson Figueiredo and Brandon Moreno, resulting in a thrilling majority draw. This event also showcased notable fights such as Tony Ferguson vs. Charles Oliveira and Mackenzie Dern vs. Virna Jandiroba.

Title: UFC 257: Poirier vs. McGregor 2
Description: UFC 257: Poirier vs. McGregor 2 was a mixed martial arts event held on January 23, 2021, at the Etihad Arena on Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. The main event featured a highly anticipated rematch between Dustin Poirier and Conor McGregor. Poirier emerged victorious with a stunning knockout in the second round, avenging his previous loss to McGregor in 2014. The event also showcased other exciting matchups, making it a memorable night for UFC fans worldwide.

Title: UFC 258: Usman vs. Burns
Description: UFC 258: Usman vs. Burns was a mixed martial arts event held on February 13, 2021, at the UFC Apex facility in Las Vegas, Nevada. The main event featured a welterweight championship bout between Kamaru Usman and Gilbert Burns. Usman successfully defended his title, winning via TKO in the third round. The event also showcased other exciting matchups, making it a memorable night for UFC fans.

Title: UFC 259: Błachowicz vs. Adesanya
Description: UFC 259: Błachowicz vs. Adesanya was a mixed martial arts event held on March 6, 2021, at the UFC Apex facility in Las Vegas, Nevada. The main event featured a clash between Jan Błachowicz and Israel Adesanya for the UFC Light Heavyweight Championship. This event also showcased two other title fights, including Amanda Nunes defending her Women's Featherweight title and Petr Yan defending his Bantamweight title. It was a highly anticipated event that drew significant attention from fans and critics alike.

Title: UFC 26: Ultimate Field of Dreams
Description: UFC 26: Ultimate Field of Dreams was held on June 9, 2000, at the Five Seasons Events Center in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. This event featured a heavyweight championship bout between Kevin Randleman and Pedro Rizzo, with Randleman emerging victorious. Additionally, the card showcased notable fighters such as Pat Miletich, Matt Hughes, and Jens Pulver, making it an exciting night for MMA fans.

Title: UFC 260: Miocic vs. Ngannou 2
Description: UFC 260: Miocic vs. Ngannou 2 was a mixed martial arts event held on March 27, 2021, at the UFC Apex facility in Las Vegas, Nevada. The main event featured a highly anticipated rematch between heavyweight champion Stipe Miocic and Francis Ngannou. Ngannou emerged victorious, claiming the title with a devastating knockout in the second round. The event also showcased other thrilling matchups, making it a memorable night for fight fans.

Title: UFC 261: Usman vs. Masvidal 2
Description: UFC 261: Usman vs. Masvidal 2 was a mixed martial arts event held on April 24, 2021, at the VyStar Veterans Memorial Arena in Jacksonville, Florida. The main event featured a highly anticipated rematch between welterweight champion Kamaru Usman and Jorge Masvidal. This event marked the first time since the COVID-19 pandemic that a full capacity crowd was allowed, making it a historic night for the UFC.

Title: UFC 262: Oliveira vs. Chandler
Description: UFC 262: Oliveira vs. Chandler was a mixed martial arts event held on May 15, 2021, at the Toyota Center in Houston, Texas. The main event featured a lightweight championship bout between Charles Oliveira and Michael Chandler. Oliveira emerged victorious, becoming the new UFC Lightweight Champion. Notably, this event marked the first time in over a decade that a non-consecutive champion was crowned in the lightweight division.

Title: UFC 263: Adesanya vs. Vettori 2
Description: UFC 263: Adesanya vs. Vettori 2 was a mixed martial arts event held on June 12, 2021, at the Gila River Arena in Glendale, Arizona. The main event featured a highly anticipated rematch between Israel Adesanya and Marvin Vettori for the UFC Middleweight Championship. Additionally, the co-main event showcased a flyweight title fight between Deiveson Figueiredo and Brandon Moreno. This event marked the first time in UFC history that two Mexican-born fighters competed for a championship.

Title: UFC 264: Poirier vs. McGregor 3
Description: UFC 264: Poirier vs. McGregor 3 was a mixed martial arts event held on July 10, 2021, at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada. The main event featured a highly anticipated trilogy fight between Dustin Poirier and Conor McGregor. The event garnered significant attention due to the intense rivalry between the two fighters and their previous encounters. Notably, this event marked McGregor's first fight since his defeat to Poirier in January 2021.

Title: UFC 265: Lewis vs. Gane
Description: UFC 265: Lewis vs. Gane was a mixed martial arts event held on August 7, 2021, at the Toyota Center in Houston, Texas. The main event featured a heavyweight bout between Derrick Lewis and Ciryl Gane for the interim UFC Heavyweight Championship. The co-main event showcased a bantamweight title fight between José Aldo and Pedro Munhoz. This event marked the first time the UFC held an interim heavyweight title fight since 2016.

Title: UFC 266: Volkanovski vs. Ortega
Description: UFC 266: Volkanovski vs. Ortega was a mixed martial arts event held on September 25, 2021, at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada. The main event featured a featherweight championship bout between Alexander Volkanovski and Brian Ortega. The co-main event showcased a women's flyweight title fight between Valentina Shevchenko and Lauren Murphy.
